data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mariano C. Michat, Patricia L. M. Torres (2016): Thermonectus tremouillesi sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae: Aciliini): description of the adults and larvae and comparisons with other species of the genus. Journal of Natural History 50 (25): 1633-1648, DOI: 10.1080/00222933.2016.1145274
